content:
Sure, here are some luxury hotels in the same area as the Connaught:

- The Dorchester: A luxury hotel located next to Hyde Park in Mayfair. It features spacious rooms and suites, Michelin-starred dining, and a rooftop spa.

- The Berkeley: A contemporary luxury hotel located in Knightsbridge. It features elegant rooms and suites, a rooftop pool, and a Michelin-starred restaurant.

- Claridge's: A historic luxury hotel located in Mayfair. It features opulent rooms and suites, a Michelin-starred restaurant, and a famous art deco bar.

- The Ritz London: A legendary luxury hotel located in Mayfair. It features ornate rooms and suites, fine dining, and a famous afternoon tea.

- The Langham, London: A historic luxury hotel located in Marylebone. It features elegant rooms and suites, a wellness center, and multiple dining options.

I hope this helps!
